name: Newton's Law (mcampb)
description:
The mission is simple: fall from the tree and assemble your apple squadron to hit Sir Isaac Newton in the head. If you mission fails? Important revelations will not be made and human progression will be halted by thousands of years. Discover what it was like to be an apple in the late 1600s in this historically accurate simulator game.  

CONTROLS

Mouse 1: start game

Mouse cursor: guide apple

CURRENT KNOWN ISSUES

- Apple counter at the bottom of the screen sometimes incorrectly counts the amount of apples the player has.

- the apple the bird carries in the second level has an incorrect range of movement once the player picks it up, this can make it difficult to keep after picking it up, as it can break as soon as it is acquired. Also, the bird apple can get in the way of the green apple by preventing it from hitting the target on level 2 which can prevent victory.

- The camera will continue to shake after the green apple hits something.

- rapidly shaking the mouse causes the camera to catch up with the green apple and clip into it which can obstruct the player's vision.

- UI text is incorrectly scaled.
